import { useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; function Popup(popuplisting) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); return ( <> {' '} setShow(false)} dialogClassName="modal-90w" aria-labelledby="example-custom-modal-styling-title" > {popuplisting.title}

Image1: Living Room

Image2: Kitchen

Ipsum molestiae natus adipisci modi eligendi? Debitis amet quae undecommodi aspernatur enim, consectetur.
